hero.title: Using Playliter
hero.description: You will find awesome tools to share your concert songs with band members.

feature.title: App features
feature.subtitle: Playliter offers the following features to help you manage your band songs:
feature.card_1_text: Organize your band's repertoire in a way that all band members have access to information.
feature.card_2_text: The presentations are visible to all band members as well as the songs that will be used and their respective tones.
feature.card_3_text: A simple interface for efficient navigation between the application's resources.
